ColourWords.Instruction: One word in each sentence is unnecessary. Click on the extra word.

ContentColourWords.Sentence: 1. There are toomuch many people on the bus.
2. I am too much young to go to nightclubs.
4. There was too much enough traffic on the road.
5. That hotel costs too many much money.
6. I tried to catch the thief, but he was too much quick.
7. We don't go to the cinema often too enough.
8. There is too much enough sport on TV.
9. We arrived at 10pm, so we were toomany late.
10. There are too many much tourists in the summer.
